October 27, 2023 speakers are [R-Ladies Rome](https://rladiesrome.quarto.pub/website) [Organizers](https://rladiesrome.quarto.pub/website/about.html) and Members



Welcome to our **`Career Development Talk`**, we're all about sharing experiences about our data science and statistics career journeys. Our latest video offers a glimpse into diverse career paths within these fields.

**Small Group, Big Conversations**

While our gathering may have been small in numbers, the quality of our conversation was anything but. We dove deep into the world of academic statistics careers, sparking a fascinating dialogue that was brimming with invaluable insights and shared experiences.

**What You Can Expect**

In this video, you'll have the opportunity to:

- **Gain Career Advice**: Discover the tips and strategies shared by professionals who've navigated the diverse landscape of data science and statistics careers.

- **Hear Personal Stories**: Get an insider's perspective as our participants recount their own unique journeys.

- **Learn from Academic Statistics Professionals**: Dive into the academic side of statistics and explore the various paths you can take in this fascinating sector.
